updates.title: Council Command Platform Launch
updates.content: Welcome to Council Command, our new centralized operational hub! This platform replaces our previous Google Sheets backend and provides a streamlined interface for accessing council resources, meeting information, and governance documents. All updates will now be posted here for immediate visibility.
updates.author: President

updates.title: MLK Day of Service - January 19th
updates.content: All chapters are required to participate in our annual MLK Day of Service on Monday, January 19, 2026. Service projects will take place across Hudson County from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Contact the Vice President for assignment details and sign-in procedures.
updates.author: Vice President

updates.title: Quarterly Financial Report Available
updates.content: The Q4 2025 financial report is now available in the Resources section. All chapters should review the report prior to the next council meeting. Questions can be directed to the Treasurer.
updates.author: Treasurer
